answers.answer: Id think that would fall under the endocrinologist field.

question: I've had this 3 yrs..my gp doc says just eat small meals a day. This isn't like others,,i can eat and my numbers be say 110,and do good till I want to use my stepper,oi cant even get 10 min in..then my sugar is at 85..70-100 is good for us hypos..but my normal is at 90 to 115..im not diabetic, I,m reactive hypo...anyways I want to fix the under lying problem..   what's the name of the docs that treat diabetes and hypos??? my gp doc not much help..                     thanks
title: what doctor to see for hypoglocemia
